languages.text: "Они желают знать, продолжится ли их братоубийственная битва. Как думаешь, {name}, что мне надлежит ответить им?"
"They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"
languages.original_text: "Они желают знать, продолжится ли их братоубийственная битва. Как думаешь, {name}, что мне надлежит ответить им?"

traits.locale_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what ought I answer them?"
"They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what ought I answer them?"
"They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"
"They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

languages.text: 「人間どもは、内輪の殺し合いがこの先も続くのか知りたいんだとよ。で、{name}、何て答えてやればいい？」
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: 「人間どもは、内輪の殺し合いがこの先も続くのか知りたいんだとよ。で、{name}、何て答えてやればいい？」

languages.text: «Quieren saber si su guerra fratricida ha de continuar. Dígame, {name}, ¿qué debería responderles?».
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: «Quieren saber si su guerra fratricida ha de continuar. Dígame, {name}, ¿qué debería responderles?».

languages.text: “他们想知道这场自相残杀的争斗是否还会继续下去。告诉我，{name}，我该如何回答他们？”
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: “他们想知道这场自相残杀的争斗是否还会继续下去。告诉我，{name}，我该如何回答他们？”

languages.text: "Sie wollen wissen, ob ihr brudermörderischer Konflikt fortgesetzt werden soll. Sagt mir, {name}, welche Antwort soll ich ihnen geben?"
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: "Sie wollen wissen, ob ihr brudermörderischer Konflikt fortgesetzt werden soll. Sagt mir, {name}, welche Antwort soll ich ihnen geben?"

languages.text: « Ils souhaitent savoir si leur bataille fratricide doit se poursuivre. Dites-moi, {name}, que dois-je leur répondre ? »
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: « Ils souhaitent savoir si leur bataille fratricide doit se poursuivre. Dites-moi, {name}, que dois-je leur répondre ? »

languages.text: "Kardeş katliamının devam edip etmeyeceğini bilmek istiyorlar. Söylesene {name}, onlara ne cevap vermeliyim?"
languages.original_text: "They wish to know whether their fratricidal struggle shall continue. Tell me, {name}, what answer should I give them?"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeş katliamının devam edip etmeyeceğini bilmek istiyorlar. Söylesene {name}, onlara ne cevap vermeliyim?"
